name: Gluten-Free Alfredo Sauce
author: thedailygourmet
summary: This is a gluten-free Alfredo sauce. It can be used as a pasta sauce, a topping for baked potatoes, or a sauce for pizza.
ingredients: 1 ½ cups freshly grated Parmesan cheese
2 pinches freshly grated nutmeg, or to taste
freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste
directions: Melt butter in a heavy saucepan over medium heat
Slowly add cream, stirring until well combined, about 3 minutes
Add Parmesan cheese; cook and stir until well incorporated, about 3 minutes
Stir in garlic powder, nutmeg, and black pepper and cook for 2 minutes
